item.title: Report X-2025020662
item.description:
Report X-2025020662

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-17T21:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-08
  • City: ADDISON
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UINTED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: NEAR BAY 29 AT THE HAZMAT AUDITOR STATION, AUDITOR NOTICED CORROSIVE HAZMAT PACKAGE HAD A WET SPOT ON A BOTTOM CORNER AND ON THE BOTTOM OF THE PACKAGE. DESIGNATED RESPONDER WAS ON THERE WAY TO ANOTHER SPILL WHEN AUDITOR TOLD RESPONDER ABOUT THE HAZMAT PACKAGE HAVING WET SPOT. SINCE THE PACKAGE WASN'T LEAKING OUT OF THE BOX, RESPONDER MADE SURE TO CONTAINERIZE THE HAZMAT PACKAGE AND ISOLATED IT FROM THE HAZMAT AUDITOR WORK STATION.

item.title: Report E-2025020213
item.description:
Report E-2025020213

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-17T21:14:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-17
  • City: CHICAGO HEIGHTS
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0143 ET, BCH notified ERTS about a cargo release inside trailer #3117938. It was reported 5 gallons of carbocoat released from a 5-gallon metal bucket. The caller reported the spill was caused due to a forklift accident. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined terminal personnel can clean the release with PPE on site. The caller reported the spill will be picked up with oil dri and placed into a 20-gallon poly drum. ERTS notified Chem-Trec of the release and spoke to Greg. Greg provided report #2024011700011.

item.title: Report X-2025020520
item.description:
Report X-2025020520

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-05
  • City: ADDISON
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SUPERVISOR CALLED OUT A LEAKER ON THE WEST BULK PAD. DESIGNATED RESPONDER ARRIVED ONTO THE SCENE, AND FOUND OUT THE PACKAGE WAS A HAZARDOUS MATERIAL PACKAGE. PACKAGE WAS CLEANED UP IN HOUSE AND BROUGHT BACK TO THE PSC AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING
